\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
The supported combinations are\+: (mode = COMPACT, places = DEVICE) -\/$>$ that will compactly bind 1 thread per device

(mode = SPREAD, places = MACHINE) with any nthreads -\/$>$ that will spread threads across all cores of the machine
